news.title: Peaches announces headline Dublin show
news.summary: Her latest single, 'Fuck Your Face', was released today.

news.title: Keanu Reeves' band Dogstar set to play Dublin gig
news.summary: Actor and bassist Keanu Reeves is a founding member of the band formed in 1991.

news.title: Live Report: Radiohead at The O2, London
news.summary: "Essentially, tonight’s masterclass featured the best live band in the world performing in the greatest city in the world..."

news.title: Nell Mescal at The Button Factory (Photos)
Fontaines D.C. and Kneecap among acts launching new Together Against The Far Right alliance
news.summary: The alliance will organise a major demonstration in London on March 28, 2026.

news.title: Radiohead postpone European Tour dates over Thom Yorke health concerns
news.summary: The ongoing tour does not include any Irish dates.

news.title: Testimony director Aofie Kelleher: "There is still so much stigma and shame felt by the survivors"
news.summary: Director Aoife Kelleher on her new documentary Testimony, which explores survivors’ courage, State complicity, and why the Mother and Baby Homes story remains unfinished business. Interview: Roe McDermott

news.title: Paul Brady announces Dublin shows
news.summary: Tickets will go on sale Friday, December 5 at 10am.

news.title: The Altered Hours: "Distortion to me is the sound of beautiful rebellion"
news.summary: Cathal MacGabhann of The Altered Hours talks about the band’s new self-titled LP, obscure ’60s compilations and the joys of distortion
